title: Request Time Off
description: An associate needs to request a day off for a future date.

tasks.description: Log into the employee scheduling portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate accesses the scheduling system.

tasks.description: Navigate to the 'Time Off Request' section.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate opens the correct form.

tasks.description: Select the date, enter a reason, and submit the request for manager approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: The time off request is successfully submitted and appears in the manager's queue for approval.
